entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:02 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 06:54 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
